backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining admin auth logic, data models, and storage mixins for books, notes, blogs, forums, and notifications.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old actor state types and a passthrough run function for upgrade compatibility.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report container with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, theme provider, layout components, and all app routes.
frontend/src/components/AdminNotificatio: Empty placeholder file for admin notifications component.
frontend/src/components/AdminSignInPanel: Admin sign-in form handling II login, admin credential submission, and error display.
frontend/src/components/BookComments.tsx: Renders a comment section for a book with form submission, comment listing, liking, and timestamp formatting using query hooks.
frontend/src/components/BookRating.tsx: Displays average ratings and allows authenticated users to rate a book, preventing duplicate ratings and showing interactive star input.
Provides an admin-style interface for adding, editing, uploading, and deleting book metadata and files with drag‑and‑drop support and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Shows a simple footer with branding, attribution, and a link to the project's Instagram page.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the main navigation bar with logo, auth controls, mobile menu, and dynamic site logo loading.
frontend/src/components/LoginRequiredMod: Modal prompting users to log in or complete their profile, with navigation and status-aware login handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Automatically prompts authenticated users to complete missing profile details and redirects them to the profile page.
frontend/src/components/UserAvatar.tsx: Renders a user avatar with optional profile image and fallback initial based on the user's name.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeMessageMo: A modal component displaying a welcome message, brief site description, and a button to begin reading.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, identity loading, and authentication state via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user data, admin authentication, and site-related backend operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes and global typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page featuring author information, site description, and an Instagram link.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page providing authentication checks and interfaces for uploading books, covers, and site assets.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPage.tsx: Displays a list of blog posts with previews, file icons, and loading states, using navigation for post selection.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Shows a placeholder blog post page indicating unavailable content and provides navigation back to the blog.
frontend/src/pages/BookReaderPage.tsx: Loads and displays book files with authentication checks, file viewer handling, and metadata retrieval.
frontend/src/pages/CharacterNoteViewerPa: Fetches and displays character notes with file previews and authentication requirements.
frontend/src/pages/ForumPage.tsx: Renders a thread list and allows creating and replying to threads with profile and authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/ForumPostPage.tsx: Placeholder page indicating an unavailable forum post and offering navigation back to the forum.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage showing featured books, character notes, blog posts, and navigation with authentication gating.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: React profile editor that loads user data, validates fields, and handles profile picture upload.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Admin settings dashboard for managing books, assets, blogs, character notes, and new coming items with upload and edit features.
frontend/src/pages/SuggestionsPage.tsx: Suggestions feed and submission page requiring authentication and profile completion.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Utility functions for normalizing errors, classifying admin login issues, and validating file uploads.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Converts bigint timestamps into human‑readable relative time strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and managing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state describing requirements to persist user data across canister upgrades, including books, profiles, posts, comments, and admin uploads.
